welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cabot, the charming city known for its beautiful landscapes, friendly community, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Cabot has to offer during your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Little Rock AFB Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Little Rock AFB Airport is used for military operations and is not open to the general public.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Adams Field Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Adams Field Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Searcy Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Searcy Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
